Package model

Class UserImpl

java.lang.Object
model.UserImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
User
public class UserImpl extends Object implements User
This class has all the functions of user model. As the user has a portfolio, this class has a portfolio object which calls its methods. This class is called by the controller.
